metadata.dc:author: Morf√≠n Maciel, Blanca
metadata.dc:description: Papular urticaria is a cutaneous manifestation caused by the sensitization to salivary antigens inoculated in insect bites. It is mainly seen in children. Clinical, aetiological, epidemiological, histophatological and immunological features are considered, as well as prevention and treatment aspects.
metadata.dc:title: Prurigo por insecto.
[Itching caused by insects].
